TEXT.S: Tuwapun Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Hwareynsu ka alang Tuwapun. 1,682 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 4,170 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 20% niqan 816 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 80% niqan 3,354 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 13%, Truku 2%, Bunun 2%, Tayal 1%, Paiwan 1%, ni rahuq na o 1%.
